Content: 64 Division under command to the Security Force Headquarters - Mullaittivu intending to sharpen inherent aesthetic skills among Army personnel organized an Inter Battalion Drama Competition during 17-19 August. The finals of the competition took place on Monday (27) at the 64 Division auditorium in the presence of Major General Dushyanta Rajaguru, Commander, Security Forces - Mullaittivu (SF-MLT). 7 Gemunu Watch and 17 (Volunteer) Gajaba Regiment drama teams competed on the stage, and finally 17 (Volunteer) Gajaba Regiment team emerged winners. 7 Gemunu Watch team was the runner-up. Commander SF-MLT gave away certificates and prizes to the winners, and best actors and actress at the venue. GOCs of 58 Division and 68 Division, together with senior Officers of the Army, Navy, Air Force and Police witnessed the finals.
